fix_modify AtC mesh delete_elements

syntax

fix_modify AtC mesh delete_elements <element_set>
  • <element_set> = name of an element set

examples

fix_modify AtC delete_elements gap

description

Deletes a group of elements from the mesh.

restrictions

related

default

none
